overview:
Rich has an extensive background in financial management and operations across multiple industries including technology, consumer electronics, retail and direct marketing.

Rich has worked with both publicly held ( e.g. GN Netcom) and privately held companies ( e.g. Bose Corporation) in an international environment and is well versed in working with companies of all sizes ranging from start-ups to multibillion revenue platforms. Rich leverages his technical financial skills with his strong business acumen and strategic vision in helping organizations meet and/or exceed the expectations of all stakeholders. Rich has a BS in Accounting and an MBA in Corporate Finance from Bentley University.
